Uses of Class
mgui.geometry.mesh.MeshTriangle

Packages that use MeshTriangle
Package Description
mgui.geometry.mesh
Provides classes representing and operating on 3D mesh shapes.

  • Uses of MeshTriangle in mgui.geometry.mesh

    Fields in mgui.geometry.mesh with type parameters of type MeshTriangle
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.ArrayList<MeshTriangle> MeshEdgeSet.triangles  
    Methods in mgui.geometry.mesh that return MeshTriangle
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MeshTriangle MeshEdgeSet.getEdgeTri​(int i, int edge)
    Returns the ith triangle index associated with this edge.
    MeshTriangle MeshEdgeSet.getOppositeTri​(int edge_idx, int face_idx)
    Get the triangle opposite to triangle at face_idx, which is joined at edge.
    MeshTriangle MeshEdgeSet.getOppositeTri​(MeshEdge edge, MeshTriangle face)
    Get the triangle opposite to face, which is joined at edge.
    Methods in mgui.geometry.mesh with parameters of type MeshTriangle
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int MeshEdgeSet.getOppositeNode​(MeshEdge edge, MeshTriangle triangle)
    Get the vertex index (i.e., in the source mesh) of the vertex opposite to triangle, which is joined at edge.
    MeshTriangle MeshEdgeSet.getOppositeTri​(MeshEdge edge, MeshTriangle face)
    Get the triangle opposite to face, which is joined at edge.
